charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] found Atticus and
Revavroom standing still.
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_030:
I have been struck with inspiration! This idea must
be noted with haste!
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_040:
Hm? So thou wast watching us,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_050:
Thou managed to come this close without me
noticing thy presence.
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_060:
’Tis no ordinary feat... But you are no ordinary
individual.
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_070:
Quite a peculiar coincidence us crossing paths in
a place like this.
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_080:
I was pondering garment designs while spending
time with Revavroom.
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_090:
When I am with Revavroom, the sound of his
engine is a soothing rhythm to mine ears and helps
me conceive good ideas.
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_100:
I suppose one could say it’s a combination of our
talents!
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_110:
Thanks to my esteem’d partner Pokémon, I feel
enliven’d as a Revavroom drench’d in poison!
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_0301_120: So you help each other out!
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_0401_130:
Indeed. We support each other in the areas we
lack and have been working hard at bettering
ourselves.
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_0402_150:
Indeed! I stand here today thanks to Revavroom,
and Revavroom is here because of me!
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_160: Together, our abilities are enhanced severalfold.
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_170: ’Tis our way as a sync pair!
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_180:
Also, a relationship of mutual improvement is not
limited to just us.
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_190:
Perhaps now is a good time to bring up
Team Star’s secret weapons. They are modified
Pokémon-powered vehicles...
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_200:
The Starmobiles! Allow me to tell you the tale of
how they came to be.
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_210: The bodies of the vehicles were built by Ortega...
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_220:
and each part is supported by the collaborative
effort of Pokémon such as Revavroom!
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_230:
At first, we lacked the firepower to move the
vehicles...
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_240:
But such issues were overcome by Mela’s
relentless endeavors!
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_250:
And so, with the combined efforts of Pokémon and
Team Star bosses, the Starmobiles came to be!
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_260:
One could even call them the fruits of Team Star’s
bond.
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_270: My Revavroom was not part of a Starmobile...
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_280:
But that is not because he did not have the
skills required.
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_290:
’Twas a decision made out of respect for each
of our strengths.
charaepi_ch0328_00_shuumei/2301_1201_300:
If thou hast comrades who respect and support
each other...
